changeSet.createView: select distinct USER_NAME,APPLICATION_NAME,SCOPE_NAME,SCOPE_ID,DATA_FROM,DATA_TO from ( select u.USER_NAME,a.NAME as APPLICATION_NAME,s.NAME as SCOPE_NAME,s.SCOPE_ID,s.DATA_FROM,s.DATA_TO from USER_T u, USER_ROLE_T ur, SCOPE_T s, APPLICATION_T a where s.APPLICATION_ID=a.APPLICATION_ID and ur.USER_ID=u.USER_ID and ur.SCOPE_ID=s.SCOPE_ID and (u.STATUS='E' or (u.STATUS='L' and u.LOCKOUT_TO<=SYSDATE)) and s.STATUS='E' and nvl(u.ACTIVE_FROM, SYSDATE)<= SYSDATE and nvl(u.ACTIVE_TO, SYSDATE)>= SYSDATE and nvl(s.ACTIVE_FROM, SYSDATE)<= SYSDATE and nvl(s.ACTIVE_TO, SYSDATE)>= SYSDATE )
